meanings.definition: The act of linking together in a chain or series.
meanings.sent1: The catenation of the colorful beads created a beautiful necklace.
meanings.sent2: The catenation of events led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent3: The catenation of the keys on the keychain made it look like a tiny metal snake.
meanings.sent4: The catenation of friendships forms a strong support system.
meanings.sent5: The catenation of paper clips on his desk resembled a miniature chain.

meanings.definition: The state of being linked together in a chain or series.
meanings.sent1: The catenation of the train cars made the whole locomotive.
meanings.sent2: The catenation of thoughts in her mind was clear and organized.
meanings.sent3: The catenation of bubbles in the bath amused the toddler.
meanings.sent4: The catenation of stars in the sky created a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The catenation of pearls on her necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
